SEARCH
Package gw.plugin.policy.refresh.ui

Class PolicyRefreshMessageContext

java.lang.Object
gw.plugin.policy.refresh.ui.PolicyRefreshMessageContext
public class PolicyRefreshMessageContext extends Object
Context used when generating errors and warnings related to a policy refresh. We walk the tree of DiffDisplay objects asking them to report any error or warning messages and this context provides information that may be useful when constructing those messages. In particular it gives a quick way to find out which items on the claim refer to an existing policy entity; these items have links that will be nulled out or replaced during the refresh. Finding links from a policy entity back to the claim is much simpler and the DiffDisplay implementation can usually just access the existing entity directly to find any such links.

  • Method Details

    • findClaimEntitiesLinkedTo

      public Set<KeyableBean> findClaimEntitiesLinkedTo(KeyableBean existingPolicyBean)
      Looks for claim graph items that have links to the given existingPolicyBean
      Parameters:
      existingPolicyBean - a bean in the existing policy that is to be removed or replaced
      Returns:
      a non null, though possibly empty, set of references to the existingPolicyBean from the given type
